The master said.

source_sentence: 用自己作麼(一作是你自己)　雲門云。
translation: "What do you do with yourself?" Yunmen said.
"I'm an immeasurable man.
He was turned away by the vein of words.
The monks asked.
"How is a learner himself?
The monk said.

source_sentence: 忽然路上有人喚衲僧齋。
translation: "Suddenly, someone on the road calls for a monk to come to the monk's hall.
You too will get a meal as you go along.
The monk replied with a verse.
'It's you yourself.
Don't be dull about it.
The monks went in twos and threes.
They simply go to bed early and get up late.'
(Dazhong Long).
"Gengsha was in front of the donkey.
After Yunmen's horse.
What did he further ask?
"How should I take the dog's mouth?
(Xuéan Jin).
Xuanzha was asked by a monk.
"How is the pure Dharma body?
The master said.
It's a droplet of pus dripping off the ground.'
The verse said.
"Every drop that falls through the body is rotten pus.
On a fishing boat, his family's style is revealed.
People of that time only looked at the silk threads.
They don't see the red of the reeds against the red of the polygon.
(The divine robe is used for carrying out the past performance).
Pus drips off the ground in golden light.
The whole Dharma body is exposed in the hall.
There was a time when the fishing boat on the Luoluo River was divided.
A single fishing boat with one leaf swam in a vast expanse.
(Yang Weowei).
[Continued] The pure Dharma body has no parallel.
After falling ill, it relies on the drops of pus from before.
The autumnal light grows old as the swallows and the torrents wail and stop.
The falling leaves are blown in like red.
(Lazy Manshu).
Each drop is rotten pus throughout his body.
There's not a single bit that falls to the west or east.
If you say it's not a soulmate.
Perhaps the wind blows in a different tune.
(Gao Feng Miao).
[Accumulation] Gengsha asked the monks to come to his service.

source_sentence: 以主丈指面前地上一點白問曰。
translation: He asked the abbot, pointing to a white spot on the ground in front of him.
"Do you still see it?
He said yes.
The master asked him this three times.
The saṃgha said three times that he saw it.
The master said.
"You see it too, and I see it too.
Why won't the Way teach?
The verse said.
'You see, and I see.'
Ten parts become apparent.
They break through the thorn forest.
Only then does he realize there's no back side.
A single point of the teaching penetrates the past and present.
Where can we discern black and white that haven't yet been distinguished?
Gengsha was asked by a monk.
"How is this an intimate matter?
The master said.
"I am Xie Sanlang.
The verse said.
'I'm a passenger on a fishing boat.
I occasionally removed my hair and put on the reddish-brown robe.
I couldn't stay in the patriarchal or buddha position.
I still sleep at night on a reed flower.
(Xuedou Xian).
"I'd like to ask you at the end of your life.
"Don't compare it to the transmission from Shaoshi to Ruisha.
Last night, after Yan returned to Shuangling, I thanked him for standing in front of the moonlight.
I thanked the family for standing in front of the bright moon.
(Tiaozi Qing).
The waves of the vast sea on Mount Min are long.
My father and son spent their entire lives in one fishing boat.
Suddenly, he stepped over and deeply and boldly reflected.
We all gathered up and left for the rest of the day.
(Cao Tang Qing).
It's the last autumn in the countryside of clouds and water.
A thousand hectares of reeds are still covered in frost.
The scenery of the river isn't sold in pieces.
I'll share them with Xie Sanlang at one time.
(Zu Yanming).
[Continued] The desolate reeds reflect the river's current.
The solitary boat swings by itself.
He didn't even care about the drizzling rain and slanting wind.
He's single-mindedly at the end of his fishing rod.
(Laughing Wengkan).
[Increased Harvest] Xuan Sha told the crowd.
"Suppose we talk about this as a metaphor for a piece of land.
It's a contract for the four stopping points of the world.
It's sold to all people and understood.
There's only the central son of the tree.
It's still there with the old monk.
The verse goes.
"The king's teacher is responsible for all things.
The son of the tree is not yet yours.
Guangxu Tu'er became a buddha.
The second patriarch repaid his debt.
(Gushan Gui).
"My grandfather sold off all his fields.
He never left it at the four boundary crossings.
"How could it be that there's a central tree?
The spring breeze never ends up disturbing him.
(Jingshan Guangdao).
'My grandfather's fields and lands all belong to me.
Is there any other way to be a son of the central tree?
It grows with its branches, leaves, and roots.
We want to see our children and grandchildren's aspirations grow vigorously.
(Dun'an Yan).
"Xuan Sha once pointed to the barrier at the top.
The four seas of Chan flow together, but I've never felt at ease.
Only the Han dynasty's prince was noble.
He returned with a flag of faith at Pengchenggaizhao.
(Jingshan Ai).
[Zengchuan] Xuan Sha said.

source_sentence: 亡僧面前正是觸目菩提。
translation: "The deceased monk's presence was precisely that of eye-catching bodhi.
It was the mark of the miraculous light at the top of his ten thousand leagues.
He spoke a verse.
"The extraordinary thing in the mountains is Xuan Sha.
His words couldn't easily be added to those of other directions.
The deceased monk truly did see this in front of him.
Subsequent generations should not scrutinize it.
(Shimen Zhong).
"Although the deceased monk wasn't a deceased monk.
Since he was, the path to enlightenment is self-penetrating.
If he had weighed in on the two paths, he would have realized them.
Not only will they be ignorant, but they'll also be deaf.'
(Prajñāpradīpa-mūlamadhyamaka).
The most straightforward thing in this is the profound truth.
He touches the eyes and speaks the whole truth without lending.
He personally witnessed it before the eyes of the deceased.
There's no more partiality, no more circumscription.
The vast forest vies for lips and kisses.
It's just like catching an illusory flower in a deserted sky.''
(Fenyang Zhao).
[Addendum] Tianyi Huaiyun.
"The deceased monk was placed in front of him.

source_sentence: 只如活人背後底是箇甚麼。
translation: It's just like what's behind the back of a living person.'
The verse goes.
'Let's just put this matter in front of the deceased monk.
Suppose we were to meet behind the back of a living person.
Ever since we broke through the clouds and southern lands.
Until now, it's been connected to the north of the country.
(Benkakuichi).
[Accumulated] Gengsha said.
"For a million miles, the divine light appears from the top of his head.
Where did he look when he didn't reach the top?
He had accomplished something and his mind was at rest.
This is the one that's come to be traced everywhere.
A wise man would like to hear about it and fiercely extract it.
Don't wait a moment to lose your head.
The verse goes.
'The top of the divine light shines without limit.
Wouldn't it be enough to say that it's 10,000 miles in size?
"If you ask what Xuanzha's mind is at the end, then.
'It's the middle of the frosty night and Calvary is cold.'
(Benkakuichi).
[Added] Xuanzha had visited the master of Samdouan.
He had only just met him.
The master said.
"Don't blame him for staying so long on the mountain without any sitting cloths?
The master said.
'Everyone has one.
Why doesn't the monastery owner have one?
He said, "Why don't you sit down and have some tea?
The master said.
'The Āmrāja master was originally here.'
The verse said.
'The paths of the neighboring hermitages are connected as they come and go.
Each step follows the other, and they trail off.
The mountains are far away, and people don't reach them in the depths of time.
A stream flows like water through a long pine.
(Luan Cong).
[Zengchuan] Xuan Sha saw him coming from Gushan.
He made a circular face.
The mountain said.
"Everyone who comes out of this won't get it.
The master said.

source_sentence: 情知你向驢胎馬腹裏作活計。
translation: "I know you're working inside a donkey's womb and a horse's belly.

'Everyone who gets out simply doesn't get out.'
He said, "Monk, you've got it this way.

'I got it, you won't get it.'

"The author was seeking medicine for a lack of illness.
'Where did he put his womb, a horse's belly, or a donkey's womb?'
That day on Drum Mountain, there was a pitiful birth.
He was picked off by someone with a white nose.
(Benkakuichi).
[Accumulation] Gengsha saw the three new arrivals.
He beat the drum of universal invitation three times on his own.
He wanted to return to the abbot's office.
They had newly arrived with proper demeanor.
He also went and beat the drum of universal invitation three times.
They then entered the saṃgha hall.
He had long stayed here in Baiyun.
"He's a newly arrived monk who doesn't like to deceive you.
The master said.
"Beat the bell to gather the crowd and examine them.
The large crowd gathered.
The newly arrived didn't show up.

The newly arrived monk just left the dharma hall.

source_sentence: 却於侍者背上拍一拍云。
translation: He then slapped the attendant on the back and said.
'The monk summons you!'
The attendant went to the master's place.
The newly arrived monk then returned to the hall.
The long-abiding monk then asked.
"Why didn't the monk check on the new arrival?

source_sentence: 我與你勘了也　最菴印云。
translation: "I'll check it out with you." He said, "It's a pity he let this monk go.
'It's a pity we let this monk go.'

"He strictly orders and follows the rules and regulations.
